description: Bitzec (http://bitzec.org/) is a fork of Zcash 2.0 with its own genesis block , it is an implementation of the "Zerocash" protocol. Based on Nakamotos Bitcoin code, it intends to offer a higher standard of privacy through a sophisticated zero-knowledge proving scheme that preserves confidentiality of transaction metadata. Technical details are available in our Protocol Specification.
name: Bitzec
